bioghist.head: Organizational Sketch
bioghist.p: The Pine Funeral Home was a well respected establishment, located on 124 Main Street, NY. Thomas J. Pine purchased the funeral home and rechristened it in the year 1894. The funeral home remained in the Pine family until 1992, when it was sold to Prime Succession, a Cincinnati-based corporation. The Pine Funeral Home officially closed its doors on January 31, 1999.
